title: Option to 'Vote-Kick' at 'Champion Select'
body:
Please Like or Comment if you agree so Riot actually notices this.

Basically is exactly as the Title. At **'Champion Select'** giving 2 chances (much like re-roll option) for the players option to **'Vote-kick'** a player/s recognized as being a potential liability to the team. Often I have noticed in chat some players in the team recognize the username of a particularly abusive/uncooperative player who is very likely to throw the game. At this point most of us know we're facing very difficult odds due to this person. In ranked this is especially frustrating since to Queue dodge incurs such steep penalties, no one wants to do it. IF you could **'Vote-kick'** at **'Champion Select'** then the only person losing LP would be the kicked player who will be forced to learn to play better with others if they wants to rise in ranked at all.
